creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
description: standing profile portrait of a man with a full moustache, dressed in a drum major uniform with a tall black fuzzy hat, leaning with his PL arm on a mace
inscription:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

URC on back, in pencil: [13]
markings: ULC, impressed in card: [STRATHMORE / TRADE (image of thistle) MARK / DRAWING BOARD]
provenance: The artist; his stepson, Jim Hogan, Hudson, WI.
title: Untitled [drum major]
